tweet: If you're a dev, invest in making sure your community knows you care, and get rid of people making it worse for everyone. It's worth it.

@NihiLTV (The thing with small minimalistic games is that any change in ruleset just ripples so clearly, so lots of redesigning happened)
@NihiLTV Then the dynamic music systems, art, porting to different platforms, cert, etc. took an additional 6-7 months.
@NihiLTV Oh, the core game was done in a month, and the design/dev of the missions, airplane types, battle flow & the like took a year-ish.
@NihiLTV It was a 2 year project that we worked on pretty much fulltime, but obviously sometimes a game is just not someone's style.
